welcome_message_title: Welcome to Santa Cruz do Sul
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Santa Cruz do Sul, where the charm of its German heritage meets the vibrant energy of Brazilian culture. Explore our beautiful parks, historical architecture, and indulge in our famous gastronomy. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Croasonho
restaurants.description: Croasonho is a bakery located in Santa Cruz do Sul.
restaurants.address: Rua Vinte e Oito de Setembro, 200 (next to Marechal Floriano), Santa Cruz do Sul, RS, 96810-042
